Belgium: Death of Baldwin V, Count of Flanders; succession of Baldwin VI, Count of Flanders
China: Yizong died. He was succeeded by his young son Emperor Huizong of Western Xia.
Yingzong died. He was succeeded by his son Emperor Shenzong of Song.
Spain: War of the Three Sanchos: The war reached a stalemate. Castile remained in possession of the Navarrese territories in modern Álava, Montes de Oca, Pancorbo, Burgos and La Rioja.
